description:
The Nura Clan is the biggest youkai faction in eastern Japan, they were first formed during the Sengoku Era and currently rule over the Kantou area. They are a yakuza youkai group with Nurarihyon as their leader and use the character for fear (Áïè) as their symbol. There are about ten thousand youkai who are considered members of the Nura group, divided into about 70 sub-clans. The group itself has been said to be in decline since the death of the second head, Rihan Nura.
The Nura Clan main house is located in Ukiyoe Town.
Source: http://nurarihyonnomago.wikia.com
name: Nura-gumi
